body:
Now, before i talk about what i want to say, im not fanboying Huahwi or anything nor showing off his vids.

So guys, my idea behind this post is to get ourselves to show the pvp gameplay/style around Avicus/OCN
(i say OCN since some of us play OCN and its pretty much the same as Avicus in terms of gamemodes
such as DTM, CTW, TDM)

Basically you just submit a clip of a "Play" that you think is pretty good, it could either be a undergeared-
killfarm, a mon rush (with defense takedown and getting the mon if possible), bridging (attacking or escaping),
4v1's against good or stacked players, or maybe even a clutch of any sort.
(note: must be a mediafire/dropbox download link so he can download, watch and maybe include the clip
into the Top 5 Vid)

Also this gives the server a chance to get more known and also encourage others to try these gamemodes.
(i guess you could say were representing Avicus)

Video Link: http://https//www.youtube.com/watch?v=ckhnDZDhVpQ
(note: Huahwi said any server will do fine as long as the play is decent or good)
